page.title: 20A Stalker's day in June
page.content:
{Continued from page 19
If we have culled deer the carcases must be returned to the cool of the game larder as quickly as possible before the heat of the day.
1pm: check mink traps set by the river, remove any caught overnight and rebait with rabbit.If some traps are continually unsuccessful they must be relocated. We may also cull rabbits where they are getting too numerous. 5pm approx: Tea exercise and feed dogs, then rest until 8.30pm.
8.30: We repeat the morning stalking on a different ground.
10.30 _ 11pm _ BED!
